Name: Extreme racing
About the game: Welcome to Extreme Racing! Into the world of speed and victory ! In an incredibly cool race that you will appreciate from the first seconds of the launch ! Extreme racing is a wonderful racing game in which you will enjoy spending your time and at the same time test your driving skills in a cool racing mode! If you are attracted to the big magical world of speed and off-scale adrenaline, then the game 'Extreme racing' is just for you! Thanks to the juicy graphics, excellent physics and realistic gameplay, the game will engage you 100% from the very first seconds! Collect pink checkpoints-checkpoints. Collected 5-congratulations! You've been awarded a lap ! There are 30 levels in total! Drive the car with the arrows and collect the checkpoints as fast as possible and be the first ! And don't forget to collect coins ! After all, thanks to them, you can replenish your fleet with new cool cars ! A total of 9 cars are available. Impressive ? Then quickly get to the game ! Choose the coolest car, start the engine and step on the gas ! Be the first !
